full_summary:
## Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst (TBIPS)

### Description of the Requirement

**Government Tender Agreement**: This procurement is governed by the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Free Trade Agreements (FTAs) with Peru, Colombia, Panama, and Korea.

**Tendering Process**: The tender process will be restricted to suppliers who are on the permanent list of prequalified suppliers or are able to meet the qualification requirements.

**Competition Method**: The selection will be based on the best overall proposal.

**Contract Details**

* The contract will be for a period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for an additional one (1) year.
* The contract will commence upon signature of the contract and shall be subject to the Standing Offer Agreement.
* The contract is valued at a total of $X for the initial period.

**Project Requirements**

* The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the professional services of a Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst, Level 2 to support the Royal Canadian Air Force Aerospace Warfare Center (RCAF AWC) Innovation Section in Trenton, ON.
* The successful vendor will provide Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst services to support the Project requirements.

**Security Requirements**

* The Bidder must have a Facility Security Clearance level of RELIABILITY.

**Submission References**

* Bidders are to submit their proposals to the contracting authority, Renee Davis, at (343) 645-5490 or Renee.Davis@forces.gc.ca.

**Contracting Entity Information**

* Contracting entity: Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2
* Contact person: Renee Davis

### Additional Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Suppliers interested in becoming a qualified SA Holder should contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca.
* Delivery date: as mentioned above
